I think this is the recommended solution for now

On Tue, Apr 25, 2017 at 5:47 PM, Jaan Altosaar ***@***.***> wrote: Thank you @goodfeli <https://github.com/goodfeli> ! It would be very useful to support this in tensorflow for calculating second-order gradients (e.g. fisher information, etc). Any hope for official support or is this the recommended solution? cc @datang1992 <https://github.com/datang1992> — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body_text:
I think this is the recommended solution for now
…
On Tue, Apr 25, 2017 at 5:47 PM, Jaan Altosaar ***@***.***> wrote:
 Thank you @goodfeli <https://github.com/goodfeli> !

 It would be very useful to support this in tensorflow for calculating
 second-order gradients (e.g. fisher information, etc).

 Any hope for official support or is this the recommended solution?

 cc @datang1992 <https://github.com/datang1992>

body:
I think this is the recommended solution for now

On Tue, Apr 25, 2017 at 5:47 PM, Jaan Altosaar <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Thank you @goodfeli <https://github.com/goodfeli> !
>
> It would be very useful to support this in tensorflow for calculating
> second-order gradients (e.g. fisher information, etc).
>
> Any hope for official support or is this the recommended solution?
>
